html:
1.31.21  1:46 am   what key is your new song in?

      D

1.31.21  12:42 am   In here comes the sun, why are your things on the mountain.

      to replace the empty box that was there before

1.30.21  11:27 pm   What's your favourite song to make?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

1.30.21  10:14 pm   "got to know whats going on" helped me get through a breakup.
Did you mean for the song to be about a relationship ending, or something else?

      it's about time

1.30.21  9:10 pm   What is your favorite part about making music?

      it helps answer everything. expecially things that are unanswerable

1.30.21  8:22 pm   what is the tempo of "we could just get high"? 

      just estimating from memory, it seems like about 110

1.30.21  7:16 pm   What is the weirdest thing you can do with the text on this page?

      express my feelings

1.30.21  6:14 pm   What rhymes with orange

      forums

1.30.21  5:27 pm   how to stop fearing imperfection

      try doing just one tiny thing bad. just to get a taste of it

1.30.21  4:11 pm   I have seen you making references to your other songs/videos often, but last week I noticed that there is a postman high on the mountains in both "hi I'm Steve" and "here comes the sun". Do your songs exist in the same universe? Are the unvireses overlapping? The people need to know

      might be the same writer

1.30.21  3:33 pm   because there's no random words, can you tell me what is the 47th word from the next song?

      about

1.30.21  2:32 pm   What does life mean

      you've got a brand new attitude, or strategy

1.30.21  1:31 pm   when james brown says "papa's got a brand new bag", what does he mean

      you've got a brand new attitude, or strategy

1.30.21  12:12 pm   how do u feel about 'im best friends with my own front door' since the uhh pandemic

      some people's front door is online

1.30.21  11:15 am   how fun is making a song

      fun enough to wanna re arrange your entire schedule

1.30.21  10:37 am   out of all the songs you haven't made yet but plan to, which one would you prefer to make in order that it may become your favorite?

      the one i'm working on

1.30.21  9:27 am   Was "Here Comes The Sun" originally written to be a reggae song?

      if you invoke the Unilateral Reggae Clause, any song can be a reggae song

1.30.21  8:42 am   How would you call and describe your genre?

      it's sort of a blend between normal and regular

1.30.21  7:05 am   what's the colour of the top left pixel in the 3rd second of your upcoming music video?

      black but that may change

1.30.21  6:36 am   what is your hobby except making videos and songs?

      making patterns, breaking them,

1.30.21  5:32 am   i want the simpler times back. why can't they come back, bill? 

      this is to enable you to have even more simple times

1.30.21  4:04 am   what is the moon made of?

      rocks

1.30.21  3:21 am   Is 42 the answer to everything?

      everything is the answer to everything

1.30.21  3:17 am   I really am inspired by the way you write and express yourself through your music, and want to learn from you, is that weird or good?

      i guess that all depends whether i am weird or good, which i will announce fairly soon

1.30.21  3:11 am   what do we do about the weather channel

      see if you can just memorize the weather

1.30.21  2:23 am   france is too french. how can I fix this

      make all the other countries even more french

1.30.21  1:12 am   i wanna make music but i don't know how to make chords sound good, like i want the chords to be heard, but not sound so obvious. how do you put chords in a song?

      start with a song you remember. find the melody, then pick just 1 note of the melody to add 1 note of harmony to. so pick your favorite note of the melody, and then at that moment in the song, play 2 notes instead of 1. find the one that helps the song the most

1.30.21  12:53 am   Why did you pursue music

      it keeps pursuing me

1.30.21  12:07 am   what song of yours is your favorite?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

1.29.21  10:39 pm   Should we think about the present or the future?

      i hope you have enough time to think about both

1.29.21  10:07 pm   if you were to condense the entire universe into a single object that would symbolically represent everything, what would it be

      a spec

1.29.21  9:58 pm   why does listening to i wanna be a movie star sometimes make me cry?

      must be the ups and downs

1.29.21  8:53 pm   is Spanish a real language?

      yes. thank you for checking with me

1.29.21  7:48 pm   did you deliberately make each verse (excluding the pre-chorus) half as long as the previous in here comes the sun? or did it just happen naturally as a result of making the first verse a "double verse" and ending the last verse early

      both. i deliberately do what happens naturally

1.29.21  6:10 pm   can you give me 1 random word from the next song?

      there are no random words in the next song

1.29.21  5:43 pm   why didn't you record any songs in 2012?

      i was writing furiously

1.29.21  5:18 pm   Do you have another long video planned?

      normal videos. i dream and yearn desperately for normal videos

1.29.21  5:12 pm   how many songs would you say you work on at a time?

      1

1.29.21  3:50 pm   I want to start writing music but I don't know how to start my song, do you have any suggestions?

      try to start it in a way you think it shouldn't start. you won't believe how much fun this can be

1.29.21  2:50 pm   Is it normal to hate tomatoes as an adult?

      yes. it's also normal to hate adults as a tomato

1.29.21  12:57 pm   What inspired you to be stuck in a rut on March 3rd, 2005?

      nothing. that is not a desirable situation. but, i was inspired to admit it, because i realized i could

1.29.21  12:51 pm   Do you think you'd do well on Jeopardy?

      that depends whether i get to host

1.29.21  12:32 pm   I am having trouble coming up with a melody, what would your advice be?

      have you thought of using some............ words

1.29.21  12:30 pm   What was the thing Damian Mamdian skipped on his to do list

      making a mess of the entire studio

1.29.21  12:14 pm   Thoughts about "the future"

      never heard of it

1.29.21  11:54 am   i was thinking about the lyrics of "here comes the sun" and i think it might be about having hope when everything seems horrible, because it'll get better eventually, giving you joy and love. am i correct?

      pretty much

1.29.21  10:35 am   why are you so logical

      i'm an aspiring logician

1.29.21  10:30 am   What was the inspiration behind and a day goes on my favorite song

      i guess i got jealous of another time, maybe in the 1800s, where people would just bang out a song on the banjo or something. so i went to the keyboard and played this, and said "songify that" and then eventually the songwriting department got hold of that (also me) and completed it. and then 2 years later the recording department got it, but that's a different story

1.29.21  10:24 am   do you have plans for another big project?

      normal projects. i dream and yearn desperately for normal projects

1.29.21  9:57 am   How do you make videos

      we'll see
